By the way, I heard

that the captain of the

Beagle is not doing well.

Oh?

It seems he’s incurred a sizeable debt trying to purchase a smaller boat he wanted for survey work.

After purchasing

the boat, he

requested a loan

from the Admiralty,

but they rejected

his request for funding.

It seems he’s prepared to cancel the voyage,

if need be.

What?

Sigh…

What will I do if he quits

the voyage?

107
